detail_desc: Nursing top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, short sleeves and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Popover jacket in soft fleece with a kangaroo pocket, stand-up collar and zip at the top with a chin guard. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Flared, ankle-length leggings in velour with a high, elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Seam under the bust and at the waist and wide, straight, ankle-length legs. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt jacket in twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and flap chest pockets with a button. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short skirt in patterned viscose jersey with wide smocking at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Short skirt in patterned viscose jersey with wide smocking at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Lined joggers in soft, stretch denim. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Lined in soft cotton jersey.

Blouse in cotton poplin with a smocked yoke and round neckline with a frilled collar and opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Voluminous, elbow-length puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim at the hems and gathers at the shoulders.

Blouse in cotton poplin with a smocked yoke and round neckline with a frilled collar and opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Voluminous, elbow-length puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim at the hems and gathers at the shoulders.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton poplin with long puff sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Frill trim around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton poplin with long puff sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Frill trim around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.

5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with a round neckline.

Jeans in stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and straight legs with an extra leg pocket.

Dress in cotton jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves in glittery tulle with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Seam at the waist and a lined skirt in three layers of sturdy tulle that has a flatlock seam at one side.
Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and covered buttons.

Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a fake flap pocket at the back. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.

Playsuit in chiffon made from recycled polyester with covered buttons at the front, a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with lined cups and a sweetheart neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with lined cups and a sweetheart neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs. Jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and flap leg pockets with a tab and D-rings. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Small bag in woven fabric that can be worn either around the waist or over the shoulder. Zip at the top, a small fabric appliqué on the front and a wide, adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Recycled polyester lining.
Bucket hats in a soft weave, one with an all-over print. Mesh lining. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Short lace dress with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
